```{r sim parms}
nVec <- c(500) #, 5000, 25000)
dVec <- c(100) #, 1000)
rhoVec <- c(0, 0.9)
# use seed = 1, 2, 3, ...
seed <- 1 #as.numeric(commandArgs(trailingOnly = T)[1])
sigmaSq <- 1
tauSq <- 0.05^2
rSq0 <- c(10, 5, 2, 1, 0.5)^2
d0 <- 5
covFn <- "matern25_scaledim_sqrelevance"

nTst <- 5000
```

```{r some opt parms, eval = T}
var0 <- 0.25
tau0 <- 1e-4
sr0 <- 1e-2
minPosi <- 1e-8
m <- 100
k <- 3
miniCQCD <- 128
miniGrad <- 128
nAvg <- 2
lambVecBrdg <- 2^(rev(-6 : 6))
convCQCD <- 1e-4
convCCD <- 1e-4
cAmij <- 1e-4
maxIterCQCD <- 20
maxIterElse <- 10
maxIterCCD <- 40
covFn <- "matern25_scaledim_sqrelevance"
mini <- T
taper <- T
silent <- F
pen_fun <- pen_avg_brdg
dpen_fun <- dpen_avg_brdg
ddpen_fun <- ddpen_avg_brdg
ngenPGPR <- 10
theta_gen <- function(){
  c(var0, (runif(d) * 0.2)^2, tau0) 
}
cluster <- makeCluster(detectCores() - 1, outfile = "tmp.out")
```

```{r storage vars, eval = T}
result <- data.frame(matrix(NA, 0, 7))
colnames(result) <- c("n", "d", "rho", "mtd", "scr", "time", "fpos")
idx <- 1
```
